title: resellersolutions
author: resellersolutions
created_time: June 09, 2022, 03:18:39 AMLast edit: June 26, 2022, 01:53:51 AM by resellersolutions
content: We`ve moved on to a different platform and are no longer in need of our Lithic/privacy issuing account. Perfect account for re-sellers who can work with a basic API. Issue up to 1000 cards per day. These cards verify as Credit Cards not cheap prepaid cards. Cards can be issued with any AVS address and cardholder information. Three types of cards can be issued: Single use, merchant locked and unlockedIncludes:Lithic/Privacy issuing account (full login invite and admin access)Business bank account (extra cost)Card BIN: 531367https://i.imgur.com/MCNqTbC.pnghttps://i.imgur.com/qy1CAxg.pnghttps://i.imgur.com/ML0ow2u.pnghttps://i.imgur.com/kJ0TppV.pnghttps://i.imgur.com/o4KXLhy.pngThis is our corporate account everything is legal. Rare opportunity and great price. Contact us on Telegram for more information. We have many services and products for re-sellers or anyone who wants to start a VCC, VBA or wallet business:Including:Fully formed USA Shelf Corporations with attached bank corporate accountsCorporate bank accounts that support unlimited VCC issuing and VBA creation full Login, admin access and 2FA includedTurnkey prepaid credit/debit card re-seller websites with integrated issuing accounts, wallet system and user portal. All products and services are legal and legit created with our corporate information so the number of products we can supply each month are very limited. First come, first serve.For more information and a full list of products and services contact us on Telegram at:@resellersolutionshttps://t.me/Resellersolutions
